item.text: From Paul, an apostle of Christ Jesus by the will of God, and Timothy our brother, to the church of God that is in Corinth, with all the saints who are in all Achaia.
Grace and peace to you from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ!
Blessed is the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, the Father of mercies and God of all comfort,

who <st data-num="3870" class="">comforts</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="2347" class="">troubles</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">so that</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">we</st> may be <st data-num="1410" class="">able</st> to <st data-num="3874" class="">comfort</st> those <st data-num="1722" class="">experiencing</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">any</st> <st data-num="2347" class="">trouble</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1223" class="">with</st> the <st data-num="3874" class="">comfort</st> with <st data-num="3739" class="">which</st> we <st data-num="846" class="">ourselves</st> are <st data-num="3870" class="">comforted</st> <st data-num="5259" class="">by</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>.

<st data-num="3754" class="">For</st> <st data-num="2531" class="">just as</st> the <st data-num="3804" class="">sufferings</st><n id="1" /> of <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="4052" class="">overflow</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">toward</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st>, <st data-num="3779" class="">so</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="3874" class="">comfort</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> <st data-num="4052" class="">overflows</st> to you.<n id="4" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="1535" class="">if</st> we are <st data-num="2346" class="">afflicted</st>,<n id="1" /> it is <st data-num="5228" class="">for</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="3874" class="">comfort</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4991" class="">salvation;</st> <st data-num="1535" class="">if</st> we are <st data-num="3870" class="">comforted</st>, it is <st data-num="5228" class="">for</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="3874" class="">comfort</st> that you <st data-num="1754" class="">experience</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> your <st data-num="5281" class="">patient endurance</st> of the <st data-num="846" class="">same</st> <st data-num="3804" class="">sufferings</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">we</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> <st data-num="3958" class="">suffer</st>.

And <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="1680" class="">hope</st> <st data-num="5228" class="">for</st> <st data-num="4771">you</st> is <st data-num="949" class="">steadfast</st> because we <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">as</st> you <st data-num="2844" class="">share</st> in<n id="1" /> our <st data-num="3804" class="">sufferings</st>, <st data-num="3779" class="">so</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> you will share in<n id="2" /> our <st data-num="3874" class="">comfort</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> we do <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2309" class="">want</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> to be <st data-num="50" class="">unaware</st>, <st data-num="80" class="">brothers</st> and sisters,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="5228" class="">regarding</st> the <st data-num="2347" class="">affliction</st> that <st data-num="1096" class="">happened</st> to <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the province of <st data-num="773" class="">Asia</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> we were <st data-num="916" class="">burdened</st> <st data-num="5236" class="">excessively</st>, <st data-num="5228" class="">beyond</st> our <st data-num="1411" class="">strength</st>, <st data-num="5620" class="">so that</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">we</st> <st data-num="1820" class="">despaired</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">even</st> of <st data-num="2198" class="">living</st>.

<st data-num="235" class="">Indeed</st> we <st data-num="2192" class="">felt</st> as if the <st data-num="610" class="">sentence</st> of <st data-num="2288" class="">death</st> had been passed <st data-num="1722" class="">against</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">us</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2443" class="">so that</st> we would <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3982" class="">trust</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">ourselves</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">in</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> who <st data-num="1453" class="">raises</st> the <st data-num="3498" class="">dead</st>.

He<n id="1" /> <st data-num="4506" class="">delivered</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="5082" class="">so great a risk</st> of <st data-num="2288" class="">death</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> he will <st data-num="4506" class="">deliver</st> us. We have <st data-num="1679">set</st> our <st data-num="1679" class="">hope</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">on</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">him</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st><n id="3" /> he will <st data-num="4506" class="">deliver</st> us <st data-num="2532" class="">yet</st> <st data-num="2089" class="">again</st>,
as you also join in helping us by prayer, so that many people may give thanks to God on our behalf for the gracious gift given to us through the help of many.

For our reason for confidence is this: The testimony of our conscience, that with pure motives and sincerity which are from God—not by human wisdom but by the grace of God—we conducted ourselves in the world, and all the more toward you.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> we do <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1125" class="">write</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="243" class="">anything</st> <st data-num="235" class="">other</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">than</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">what</st><n id="1" /> you can <st data-num="314" class="">read</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> <st data-num="1921" class="">understand</st>. <st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> I <st data-num="1679" class="">hope</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> you will <st data-num="1921" class="">understand</st> <st data-num="2193 5056" class="">completely</st><n id="2" />

<st data-num="2531">just as</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> you have <st data-num="3313">partly</st> <st data-num="1921" class="">understood</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st>, <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> we <st data-num="1510">are</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> source of <st data-num="2745" class="">pride</st> <st data-num="2509">just as</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> are <st data-num="1473" class="">ours</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st> of the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> with <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="4006" class="">confidence</st> I <st data-num="1014">intended</st> to <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="4387">first</st> <st data-num="2443">so that</st> you would <st data-num="2192" class="">get</st> a <st data-num="1208" class="">second</st> <st data-num="5485">opportunity</st> to see us,<n id="1" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> help to <st data-num="1330">go on</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> <st data-num="3109" class="">Macedonia</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3825" class="">then</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="3109" class="">Macedonia</st> to <st data-num="2064">come back</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> be <st data-num="4311">helped on</st> our way <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> <st data-num="2449" class="">Judea</st> <st data-num="5259" class="">by</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>.

<st data-num="3767" class="">Therefore</st> when I was <st data-num="1014" class="">planning to do</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st>, <st data-num="1644" class="">I</st> did not do so <st data-num="1644" class="">without thinking</st> about what I was <st data-num="5530" class="">doing</st>, did I?<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2228" class="">Or</st> do I <st data-num="1011">make</st> my <st data-num="1011" class="">plans</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2596" class="">according to</st> mere <st data-num="4561">human standards</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="2443">so that</st> <st data-num="1473">I</st> would <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> saying<n id="4" /> both “<st data-num="3483" class="">Yes</st>, <st data-num="3483" class="">yes</st>” <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> “<st data-num="3756" class="">No</st>, <st data-num="3756" class="">no</st>” at the same time?

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> as <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> is <st data-num="4103" class="">faithful</st>, <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="3056" class="">message</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> “<st data-num="3483" class="">Yes</st>” <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> “<st data-num="3756" class="">No</st>.”

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> the <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>, <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>, the one who was <st data-num="2784" class="">proclaimed</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">among</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">by</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st>—<st data-num="1223" class="">by</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4610" class="">Silvanus</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5095" class="">Timothy</st>—<st data-num="1096" class="">was</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> “<st data-num="3483">Yes</st>” <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> “<st data-num="3756">No</st>,” <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> it has always <st data-num="1096" class="">been</st> “<st data-num="3483">Yes</st>” <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="3745">every one</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God’s</st> <st data-num="1860" class="">promises</st> are “<st data-num="3483">Yes</st>” <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him;</st> <st data-num="1352" class="">therefore</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> the “<st data-num="281">Amen</st>” is spoken, <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="1391" class="">glory</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">we</st> give to <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> it is <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> who <st data-num="950" class="">establishes</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> together <st data-num="4862" class="">with</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> who <st data-num="5548" class="">anointed</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st>,<n id="2" />
who also sealed us and gave us the Spirit in our hearts as a down payment.
Now I appeal to God as my witness, that to spare you I did not come again to Corinth.

I do <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> mean <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> we <st data-num="2961">rule over</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> we <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="4904">workers with</st> you for <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="5479" class="">joy</st>, <st data-num="1063" class="">because</st> by <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st> you <st data-num="2476">stand firm</st>.<n id="1" />
